last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 5
last_episode_to_air.overview: The season has started. Finding himself still playing for Manchester, Paul Pogba is now focused on his new goals: winning titles with his club and as part of the national team. But a question mark still looms over his future. Soon, Paul will be free to sign with whoever he wants. Which club will he choose?

name: The Pogmentary: Born Ready
overview: A glimpse into the life of Paul Pogba, the influential world-class French footballer.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Paul Pogba, age 28, who helped win the world cup for France, is one of the best soccer players on the planet. The end of the season is approaching. A year away from the end of his contract, Paul is at a turning point in his career. Should he leave his chosen club, Manchester United, or sign a new contract with them?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Paul Pogba is under a lot of pressure while the season is coming to an end, between his uncertain future and the fast-approaching Euro cup with Les Bleus. But he can always count on his family. Before he joins the French team, Paul gets back to his roots in Roissy-en-Brie, the town where he was born. Back to where it all began.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: As the reigning world champions, Paul Pogba and Les Bleus are aiming to repeat their feat at the Euro cup. Behind the scenes, rumors about Paul's future abound. And while he manages to assert himself as the leader of the French team through on-field performances that are getting him noticed, nothing else is going according to plan.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: After the disappointment that was the Euro cup, Paul Pogba is relaxing with his family in Miami. Even though he still knows nothing about his future, he is training like never before for a thunderous start to the new season. In Europe, many conversations about his transfer are taking place. Behind the scenes, his agent, Mino Raiola, is working hard at it.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The season has started. Finding himself still playing for Manchester, Paul Pogba is now focused on his new goals: winning titles with his club and as part of the national team. But a question mark still looms over his future. Soon, Paul will be free to sign with whoever he wants. Which club will he choose?
